mapper.insert: insert into dtp_submitlog (logId, bxid, txid, logIndex, content, status) values(#{logId}, #{bxid}, #{txid}, #{logIndex}, #{contentByte}, #{logStatus})
mapper.update: update dtp_submitlog set status=#{logStatus} where logId=#{logId}
mapper.select: select logId, bxid, txid, logIndex, content as contentByte, status from dtp_submitlog where logId=#{logId}
select logId, bxid, txid, logIndex, content as contentByte, status from dtp_submitlog where bxid=#{bxid} order by logIndex
select logId, bxid, txid, logIndex, content as contentByte, status from dtp_submitlog where bxid=#{bxid} and status=#{logStatus} order by logIndex
